summary: This is an email chain from January 6, 2020, between FBI personnel discussing the need to contact a witness in Sweden for an interview related to the Jeffrey Epstein/Ghislaine Maxwell investigation. The case agent seeks guidance on proper channels before reaching out.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named as a subject in an FBI investigation, alongside Ghislaine Maxwell, concerning potential child exploitation and human trafficking.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Named as a subject in an FBI investigation, alongside Jeffrey Epstein, concerning potential child exploitation and human trafficking.

persons.name: ALAI
persons.context: An individual in Stockholm, Sweden, copied into the email chain to be brought up to speed on the investigation particulars before contacting a witness.

connections.description: Both are named as subjects in the same FBI investigation into child exploitation and human trafficking.

events.title: FBI coordination to interview Swedish witness
events.description: An FBI case agent initiates coordination with the FBI Legat in Copenhagen to properly contact and interview a witness located in Sweden regarding the Epstein/Maxwell investigation.

keyFacts: The FBI was actively investigating Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell for child exploitation and human trafficking as of January 2020.
The investigation involved a witness located in Sweden whom the FBI sought to interview.
The FBI case agent was following proper international protocols by coordinating with the FBI Legat office in Copenhagen, which has authority over Sweden, before contacting the witness.
The email chain shows internal FBI procedural coordination regarding witness contact in a foreign country.
